docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-17 China's favorable trading status should be extended for another year, President Bush said, in a move that reopened a conflict with Congress over relations with China and even surprised his staff. Page A1 Senate asks Bush to back loan guarantees for Soviets D1
